Class OracleProxyDataSource

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DelegatingDataSource
com.stag.identity.shared.config.OracleProxyDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Wrapper, CommonDataSource, DataSource, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class OracleProxyDataSource extends org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DelegatingDataSource

Oracle Proxy DataSource

A DataSource wrapper that automatically opens and closes Oracle proxy sessions. It extends Spring's DelegatingDataSource for robustness and compatibility. Each connection obtained from this DataSource will have an active proxy session for the configured target user.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Jakub Pavlíček
